","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"62uhm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9mmct","text":" Incubation time may need to be optimized depending on tissue ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5nmh0","text":"With a wide-pore P1000 barrier pipet tip homogenize the tissue by pipetting up and down (3-5X) until the tissue readily passes through the pipet tip.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"sgna","text":"Transfer tissue homogenate to the dounce homogenizer with a wide-pore P1000 barrier pipet tip.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b81ta","text":"Wash the sample tube with of lysis buffer (+ DTT \u0026 RNase inhibitors) and transfer buffer to the dounce homogenizer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9er7g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c728b","text":" This step ensures optimal retention of semi-homogenized tissue for dounce homogenization","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fbcbu","text":"Prepare nuclei storage buffer and place on ice:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cll0h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cg3db","text":"Nuclei Storage Buffer:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":22}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"arm0c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cn1d7","text":"  1X PBS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"df7d7","text":"  SUPERase•In™ RNase Inhibitor, 20 U/uL","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3qadd","text":"  RNaseOUT™ Recombinant Ribonuclease Inhibitor, 5,000 units","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"58uk3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"6","error":false,"guid":"50D004E64EEF11EDBCE60A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"15","error":false,"guid":"50D0060D4EEF11EDBCE60A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"7.5","error":false,"guid":"7C293CD74EEF11EDBCE60A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6kk2b","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"efq2j","text":"Start with 2-3 washes.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"hfr6","text":"Remove the supernatant and add   of wash \u0026 resuspension buffer. Let the pellet sit for 2 min. on ice prior to re-suspending.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":31,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4khp8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"12F231004C2011ED929D2FD77199E45A","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9qllo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"48kop","text":"Centrifuge at 600 x g for 5 min. @ 4°C. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7blgo","text":"Remove the supernatant and add   of wash \u0026 resuspension buffer. Let the pellet sit for 2 min. on ice prior to re-suspending.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":31,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f2iqb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1n3bs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"A579EEB74EED11EDBCE60A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b5m9m","text":"Gently re-suspend the nuclei pellet with a wide-pore P1000 barrier pipet tip. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fbmbe","text":"Pass the resuspended nuclei through a 40 µm Flow cell strainer into a 1.5 mL LoBind Eppendorf tube (pre-chilled).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9dhd2","text":"Centrifuge at 600 x g for 5 min. @ 4°C. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c08jn","text":"Remove the supernatant and add   of wash \u0026 resuspension buffer. Let the pellet sit for 2 min. on ice prior to re-suspending.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":31,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"32qe4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"da5va","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ahm8s","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"89j75","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"750","error":false,"guid":"0E804A894EEE11EDBCE60A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6e2jl","text":"At this point you can pause and check the quality of the nuclei under a microscope at 40-60X magnification. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1iaqt","text":"Add   of pre-chilled Fixation Solution and immediately mix gently by pipetting up and down 3X with a wide-pore P1000 barrier pipet tip. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"kq1m","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9s940","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fp8v8","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"l8s9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ddlo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3f0et","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"250","error":false,"guid":"1BC61F804EF011ED86F3A551A6142A61","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"5t32p","text":"Caution should be taken when pipetting nuclei in the fixation solution, too forceful or frequent pipetting will risk shearing of nuclear membrane. Only pipet enough to suspend nuclei in solution (3X recommended)","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9ug8a","text":"Incubate for 10 minutes on ice. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"89gr6","text":"Add   of Permeabilization Solution and mix gently by pipetting up and down 3X with a wide-pore P1000 barrier pipet tip. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5k1l1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"40","error":false,"guid":"61124BE04EF011ED86F3A551A6142A61","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8pcns","text":"Incubate for 3 minutes on ice. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"486qj","text":"Centrifuge at 500 x g for 5 min. @ 4°C in the swinging bucket rotator.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d0muu","text":"Gently re-suspend the nuclei pellet with a wide-pore P1000 barrier pipet tip. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"54t3h","text":"Filter nuclei through a 40 µM strainer into a 1.5 mL LoBind Eppendorf tube (pre-chilled) using a wide-pore P1000 barrier pipet tip. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7cp53","text":"Add   of DMSO and gently flick the tube 3X, wait 1 minute on ice. Repeat 3X to add a total of   DMSO. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":94,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2djf2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"292A34304EF111ED86F3A551A6142A61","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"15","error":false,"guid":"6AAC60404EF111ED86F3A551A6142A61","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6r1o","text":"Mix the final suspension 5X with a P200 barrier pipet tip and aliquot for future experiments.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fa15","text":"Place aliquoted nuclei suspensions in a Mr. Frosty to cool at -1°C/minute in a -80°C freezer overnight. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cg5s2","text":"Fixed nuclei suspensions can be stored at -80°C for up to 6 months. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"23v1r","text":"Add 1 mL cold nuclei neutralization buffer and gently invert the tube 3X to mix","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1795k","text":"Chill dounce homogenizers and tubes at 4°C in wet ice bucket","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9hq1v","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1o5v2","text":"Per sample:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9m1g8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bsfua","text":"2mL x 60 mm KIMBLE Dounce tissue grinder set","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bi9qm","text":"(2) DNA LoBind® Tubes, 1.5 mL","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
